text: Meet Abby! She’s a bright and energetic young girl, and she’s one of the many Hoosiers who are at a high risk of becoming severely ill from #COVID19. We need you to #MaskUpHoosiers and help keep people like Abby safe and healthy while we get #BackOnTrack. https://t.co/fdmjQ8litM
